recipe.title: Frozen Strawberry Lemonade Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 6 ; strawberries, stemmed and halved, plus whole strawberries for garnish
â…“ cup ; lemon-lime soda, or 3 ounces (90 ml) vodka ; (80 mL)

steps.step: Fill an ice cube tray with 2 cups (480 ml) of lemonade. Freeze for at least 2 hours.
Add the lemonade cubes, strawberries, the remaining cup of lemonade, and lemon-lime soda to a blender and blend on high speed until smooth.
Pour into glasses and garnish with strawberries.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Fill an ice cube tray with 2 cups (480 ml) of lemonade.
Add the lemonade cubes, strawberries, the remaining cup of lemonade, and lemon-lime soda to a blender and blend on high speed until smooth.
Pour into glasses and garnish with strawberries.
